item.title: Should I buy gold in case the financial system implodes? I’m 62, retired and worried.
item.description: If things go poorly for the world, this reader wants to grab the gold and keep going.

item.title: Worried about U.S. stocks? You can diversify in a market loaded with potential
item.description: Japanese companies have already been working to address the demographic problems that will be faced by other countries

item.title: Tepper, Burry bet big on Alibaba, and now they’re getting rewarded
item.description: Big-name investors who bet big on Alibaba got rewarded on Thursday as the Chinese conglomerate reported better-than-expected earnings.

item.title: Satya Nadella says he’s not an economist — and proved it with this common misconception
item.description: Microsoft Chairman and Chief Executive Satya Nadella said in an interview released Wednesday that he’s not an economist. And then he showed why.
